projectGridLines.title: Breakdown Prediction of Medical Equipment
projectGridLines.description:
Description: In this project, interns will utilize machine learning techniques to develop predictive

models for anticipating breakdowns in medical equipment. By analyzing historical maintenance data

and equipment performance metrics, interns will work towards creating algorithms capable of

forecasting potential malfunctions before they occur. This internship offers an opportunity to gain

practical experience in data analysis, predictive modeling, and the healthcare technology sector.

Skill sets: Internet of Things, Data Science, Machine Learning, Machine Electronics

Traits expectation: High intent to learn, high energy, Hardworking, Disciplined, Organized

Expected learning: - Internet of Things, Data Science, Machine Learning, Machine Electronics

Specific courses required for project execution: Students involved in practical projects in

electronics club or those who have participated in technical fests in electronics events will be

preferred

projectGridLines.title: Service App (Client Facing)
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Join our team in developing a cutting-edge Service App designed for hospitals and clients.

This project aims to create a user-friendly platform for tracking medical equipment history and facilitating

service requests. As an intern, you'll contribute to the development of an innovative solution that

enhances healthcare asset management, improving patient care and operational efficiency. Gain

valuable experience and make a difference in healthcare technology with us.

Skill sets: Flutter programming language

Traits expectation: High intent to learn, high energy, Hardworking, Disciplined, Organized

Expected learning: Flutter programming language

Specific courses required for project execution:

projectGridLines.title: Service App (Service Partner Facing)
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Our project aims to develop a cutting-edge service app tailored for service engineers and

professionals in the healthcare industry. Through seamless onboarding, these skilled individuals will

gain access to a platform where they can efficiently tackle service requests raised by hospitals and

doctors. By bridging the gap between demand and expertise, our app revolutionizes the way service

professionals connect with work opportunities, ultimately enhancing operational efficiency and customer

satisfaction in healthcare settings.

Skill sets: Flutter programming language

Traits expectation: High intent to learn, high energy, Hardworking, Disciplined

Expected learning: Flutter

Specific courses required for project execution:

projectGridLines.title: Service Modules in Admin Panel
projectGridLines.description:
Description: This project involves the integration of service modules into our internal admin panel.

Designed to support both client-facing and service engineer-facing aspects of our service app, these

modules streamline administrative tasks, enhance workflow management, and ensure seamless

coordination between various stakeholders. By incorporating these modules, our admin panel becomes

a centralized hub for efficiently managing service operations, empowering our team to deliver

exceptional service experiences to both clients and service professionals.

Skill sets: React.js, MERN Stack

Traits expectation: High intent to learn, high energy, Hardworking, Disciplined, Organized

Expected learning: React.js, MERN Stack

Specific courses required for project execution:
